results.content: Very nice for being a 2 hour free course. Looking forward to more courses from you. Only thing I have to complain about is the dubstep intro for every video.
results.content_html: Very nice for being a 2 hour free course. Looking forward to more courses from you. Only thing I have to complain about is the dubstep intro for every video.

results.content: Thanks for this introductory course to Angular. Maybe the author could add subtitles because it is a bit difficult to understand. The initial banner is a bit too loud.

results.content:
Hi,

Thanks,

results.content: The intro is too loud and too long. Also, considering how the videos follow one another, I believe both the intro and outro are unnecessary - maybe keep the intro for the first video of each chapter and the outro for the last video of each chapter

response.content: Thank you so much for your valuable response and rating. I really appreciate that. I will surely take your suggestions in mind while making any other courses. I hope you would have got valuable information from this course. Thank you so much for giving your valuable time.

results.content: The instructor shares a good piece of information. This course can also be taken by those who have little knowledge about web development languages and do not know anything about Angular JS.

response.content: Thank you so much for rating my course. Udemy only provide 2 hours to complete free course. So, it is not possible to complete full Angular course in 2 hours. I appreciate your valuable rating. Thank you!
